overview:
Greg Goff is CEO of CareDox Inc, publisher of MotherKnows.com.

Greg is co-founder of CareDox and MotherKnows.com. MotherKnows.com is a full service online personal health record for parents. MotherKnows collects and displays the health records of babies and young children to help parents manage the healthcare of their children.

Greg has served in leading roles for a number of web properties and media firms. He served as the President of Primedia Digital, a leading automotive network, that includes Automotive.com and MotorTrend.com among its numerous sites. The group has been the nation’s leading provider of new car leads.

Greg served as General Manager of Targeted Publishing for the number two newspaper publisher, Knight Ridder, directing new product development for the firm. Greg launched over 50 new products, including local web and print properties as well as consumer trade shows.

Greg was Presdient of Village Voice Media Digital, and before that was part of the founding team for BabyCenter.com, the leading website for new and expectant mothers. Greg served as the original VP of Marketing for BabyCenter and also managed Product Development.

Greg was part of the founding team of Harmon Publishing- the leading publisher of local real estate magazines. Greg launched Homes.com, one of the early online classified products.

Greg began his career at Procter & Gamble, where he was the Brand Manager of Crest toothpaste and worked on Pampers and Always.

Greg currently serves on the Board of Directors for CareDox and previously sat on the Boards of Automotive.com and Village Voice Media.
